This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with moderate to severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD). The study aims to evaluate the efficacy of the drug nva237 compared to a placebo in improving lung function. The inclusion criteria include patients with a smoking history of at least 10 pack years and a post-bronchodilator FEV1 between 40% and 70% of the predicted normal. The exclusion criteria include pregnant or nursing women, patients with recent COPD exacerbation or lower respiratory tract infection, and patients with certain cardiovascular abnormalities.

This phase 3 trial is investigating the effectiveness of the drugs hzt-501 and ibuprofen in patients with osteoarthritis, rheumatoid arthritis, chronic low back pain, chronic regional pain syndrome, and chronic soft tissue pain who are expected to require daily administration of an NSAID for at least the coming 6 months and have completed a previous 24-week treatment period. The study has specific inclusion and exclusion criteria, including the absence of certain medical conditions and meeting the criteria of previous protocols.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of advanced melanoma using the drugs gsk2118436 and dacarbazine (dtic), targeting patients with BRAF mutation positive melanoma who are treatment naive and have measurable disease according to RECIST 1.1 criteria.
This sample is a phase 3 trial for HIV infections, testing the effectiveness of darunavir and ritonavir as antiretroviral treatments, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), testing the effectiveness of indacaterol and placebo to indacaterol in treating the disease. The eligibility criteria include a diagnosis of COPD, a smoking history of at least 10 pack-years, and specific lung function measurements. Various exclusion criteria are also listed.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for breast cancer patients, testing the drug exemestane, with eligibility criteria including increased risk factors for breast cancer and postmenopausal women over the age of 35, and prior concurrent therapy restrictions.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for major depressive disorder, testing the drug vortioxetine (lu aa21004), with inclusion criteria including completion of a short-term treatment study for major depressive episode, and exclusion criteria including any current psychiatric disorder other than MDD, non-use of effective contraception for female patients of childbearing potential, and use of any psychoactive medication.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of acute bacterial skin and skin structure infections (ABSSSI) caused by Gram-positive pathogens, using single-dose iv oritavancin diphosphate and iv vancomycin as the study drugs, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for eligible subjects.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for rheumatoid arthritis, testing the effectiveness of tocilizumab and DMARDs compared to a placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for patient eligibility.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for HIV-associated neuropathic pain, testing the effectiveness of pregabalin and placebo in reducing moderate to severe pain in subjects with confirmed HIV infection, while excluding pregnant or breastfeeding females, street drug or alcohol abusers, and subjects on certain medications.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for the treatment of psoriasis, testing the drugs cp-690,550 and placebo/cp-690,550, with eligibility criteria including a diagnosis of moderate to severe plaque psoriasis and a Psoriasis Area and Severity Index (PASI) score of 12.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with type 2 diabetes, testing the effectiveness of insulin degludec/insulin aspart in combination with metformin and other oral anti-diabetic drugs. The inclusion criteria include having a diagnosis of type 2 diabetes for at least 24 weeks, being insulin naïve, and having a HbA1c level between 7.0-10.0%. The exclusion criteria include recent use of GLP-1 receptor agonists, recurrent severe hypoglycemia, and known hypersensitivity to trial products.

This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of a fixed combination ophthalmic solution containing bimatoprost and timolol in treating ocular hypertension and glaucoma, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for patient eligibility.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), testing the drug tiotropium. The inclusion criteria include being at least 40 years old, having a smoking history of more than 10 pack-years, and having a Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 Second (FEV1) less than 60% predicted. The exclusion criteria include a recent history of cardiac issues, asthma or allergic conditions, malignancy requiring treatment within the past 5 years, life-threatening pulmonary obstruction, cystic fibrosis, clinically evident bronchiectasis, known active tuberculosis, and known hypersensitivity to anticholinergic drugs.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of hypercholesterolemia and dyslipidemia, testing the drugs abt-335 and rosuvastatin calcium, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for the treatment of schizophrenia, focusing on patients with a diagnosis of paranoid, disorganized, catatonic, residual, or undifferentiated subtype with persistent negative symptoms. The study includes the drugs asenapine and olanzapine, and the inclusion criteria require a caregiver. Exclusion criteria include uncontrolled medical conditions and other psychiatric disorders.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of migraine with or without aura, testing the effectiveness of drugs such as maxalt 10mg mlt plus caffeine 75mg and maxalt 10mg mlt plus placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for renal transplantation, testing the drug enteric-coated mycophenolate sodium (ec-mps), with inclusion criteria including recipients of de novo cadaveric, living unrelated or living related kidney transplants, and exclusion criteria including more than one previous renal transplantation and patients receiving a kidney from a non-heart beating donor.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for participants with chronic hepatitis C genotype 4, testing the efficacy of drugs such as bms-790052, pegylated-interferon alfa 2a, and ribavirin, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the effectiveness of lixisenatide, exenatide, and metformin in controlling blood sugar levels, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial aims to evaluate the efficacy of Exparel 266 mg, a local anesthetic, compared to a placebo in reducing postoperative pain in patients undergoing thoracotomy, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria outlined.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for adults with chronic hepatitis B, testing the effectiveness of pegylated interferon alpha-2b in patients who meet specific inclusion criteria and do not have certain exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for iron deficiency anemia, testing the drugs ferumoxytol and iron sucrose in participants with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria, such as low hemoglobin and transferrin saturation levels, history of unsatisfactory oral iron therapy, and no allergies to IV iron.

The sample is a phase 3 trial studying the effectiveness of prednisolone and mycophenolate mofetil, as well as prednisolone and tacrolimus, in treating lupus nephritis and membranous glomerulonephritis, with eligibility criteria including abnormal urine protein excretion and biopsy-proven membranous lupus nephritis.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), testing the effectiveness of various drugs including gsk573719/gw642444 and tiotropium bromide, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 clinical trial is testing the effectiveness of folate, methotrexate, methylprednisolone, placebo, and rituximab in treating rheumatoid arthritis in adult patients who are naive to methotrexate treatment.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial testing the effectiveness of topiramate and placebo in treating partial seizure disorder, epilepsy, and seizures in infants aged 1-24 months who are receiving regular enteral feedings and weigh between 3.5 and 15 kg. The study has specific inclusion and exclusion criteria, and the goal is to evaluate the efficacy of topiramate as an antiepileptic drug.
This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with advanced renal cell carcinoma, testing the drug Nexavar (sorafenib) as a single agent treatment, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with moderate to severe idiopathic Parkinson's disease, testing the efficacy of preladenant and rasagiline as potential treatments, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with breast cancer, testing the effectiveness of docetaxel and gemcitabine in treating unresectable, locally recurrent, or metastatic disease, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the efficacy of sitagliptin compared to a placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for eligibility.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for locally advanced breast cancer, testing the drugs trastuzumab, doxorubicin, paclitaxel, and cmf, with inclusion criteria of female patients aged 18 or older and exclusion criteria of previous therapy for any invasive malignancy.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for the treatment of bacterial pneumonia, testing the effectiveness of ceftaroline fosamil for injection, ceftriaxone, and placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for subjects.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for rheumatoid arthritis patients who have experienced a disease flare after initial response to infliximab, and it aims to evaluate the efficacy and safety of different dosing schedules of infliximab.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for asthma patients, testing the effectiveness of omalizumab, placebo, and fluticasone as treatments, with specific eligibility criteria including age, weight, IgE levels, asthma diagnosis, positive skin test, and lung function.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for rheumatoid arthritis, testing the effectiveness of different drug combinations including abatacept, infliximab, and placebo, with specific eligibility criteria for participants.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for the treatment of overactive bladder using normal saline (placebo) in patients with neurogenic overactive bladder due to spinal cord injury or multiple sclerosis, who have had an inadequate response to anticholinergic medication.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for non-small-cell lung carcinoma, testing the efficacy of sorafenib + paclitaxel + carboplatin compared to placebo + paclitaxel + carboplatin, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with generalized anxiety disorder, testing the effectiveness of quetiapine fumarate and escitalopram oxylate as potential drugs, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of chronic lymphocytic leukemia using obinutuzumab, rituximab, and chlorambucil, with specific eligibility criteria including age, disease type, and previous treatment history.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with Crohn's disease, testing the effectiveness of clarithromycin and placebo in combination with prednisolone or budesonide, azathioprine, and 5-ASA preparation, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for restless legs syndrome, testing the drug rotigotine, with inclusion criteria of idiopathic RLS and exclusion criteria of secondary RLS, history of sleep disturbances, and symptomatic orthostatic hypotension.

This phase 3 trial aims to evaluate the effectiveness of valsartan and enalapril, two drugs commonly used to treat hypertension, in children and adolescents aged 6-17 with a documented history of hypertension. The study includes specific inclusion and exclusion criteria, such as age, weight, blood pressure measurements, and the absence of certain medical conditions.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for trauma patients with ongoing significant hemorrhage, testing the effectiveness of tranexamic acid and sodium chloride 0.9% in reducing blood loss. The eligibility criteria include patients with low blood pressure or high heart rate within 8 hours of injury, while exclusion criteria include patients with clear indications or contraindications for antifibrinolytic therapy.

In this phase 3 trial, the drug montelukast sodium is being tested for its effectiveness in treating episodic asthma in patients aged 6 months to 5 years, with exclusion criteria including patients who are not in otherwise good health and patients with persistent asthma.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with partial epilepsy and partial seizures, where the drug being tested is levetiracetam, and the eligibility criteria include age range, weight range, and specific diagnostic and treatment requirements.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for kidney transplantation, testing the drugs tacrolimus, mycophenolate mofetil, and steroids, with inclusion criteria including patients aged 60 or older and exclusion criteria such as previous organ transplants or significant infections.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with refractory epilepsy, testing the effectiveness of Keppra® extended release formulation - XR compared to a placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with type 1 diabetes, testing the effectiveness of insulin degludec, insulin detemir, and insulin aspart in controlling blood sugar levels, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 trial studying the effects of dehydroepiandrosterone and placebo on women aged 40-65 years with decreased desire or interest in sexual activity, with inclusion criteria including being postmenopausal, sexually active, and having a BMI of 18-34 kg/m2.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of chronic hepatitis C, testing the efficacy of eltrombopag and placebo drugs in combination with peginterferon and ribavirin antiviral therapy, with specific eligibility criteria for subjects to participate in the study.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for major depressive disorder, testing the drugs DVS-233 SR and venlafaxine ER, with inclusion criteria including outpatients and sexually active individuals using contraception, and exclusion criteria including previous treatment with DVS-233 SR or venlafaxine and hypersensitivity to venlafaxine.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) who have failed prior treatments. The study is testing the efficacy of talactoferrin and placebo drugs in patients with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.
This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for children with asthma, testing the effectiveness of different doses of map0010 and a placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 2/phase 3 trial testing the drugs telmisartan and bisoprolol versus placebo in patients with diabetes mellitus, heart failure, and coronary artery disease. The eligibility criteria include age > 18 years, known diabetes mellitus > 6 months, increased Nt-proBNP above 125pg/ml, and informed consent. Exclusion criteria include other diseases with a life expectancy below 1 year, chronic infection or malignant disease, women in childbearing age without contraceptive, history of cardiac disease, systemic cortisone treatment, and patients on chronic or acute hemodialysis, ultrafiltration, or peritoneal dialysis.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of proctitis, a disease affecting the rectum, using drugs such as mesalamine and canasa, as well as a placebo, with specific eligibility criteria for participants.
This phase 3 trial aims to evaluate the effectiveness of donepezil, a drug used for Alzheimer's disease, compared to a placebo in reducing sedation caused by opiates in patients with advanced cancer.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), testing the efficacy of the drug qva149 compared to a placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria outlined.
This sample is a phase 2/phase 3 trial testing the use of Lamictal in the treatment of post-herpetic neuralgia, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for patient eligibility.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for the drug vilazodone in patients with major depressive disorder, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria, and the study aims to assess the drug's efficacy in treating the disorder.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for multiple sclerosis, testing the efficacy of glatiramer acetate (db) and glatiramer acetate (ol) compared to a placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for eligible subjects.
This sample is a phase 3 trial for heartburn, testing the effectiveness of esomeprazole as a heartburn medication, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of schizophrenia, testing the drugs bifeprunox and quetiapine, with the inclusion criteria being a diagnosis of schizophrenia, age between 18-65 years, and no recent hospitalization for an exacerbation of schizophrenia.
This phase 3 trial is investigating the effectiveness of smc021 oral calcitonin and smc021 placebo in treating knee osteoarthritis, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria outlined.

This sample is a phase 2/phase 3 trial for patients with non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) and includes eligibility criteria related to disease characteristics, patient characteristics, and prior concurrent therapy. The trial will test the effectiveness of carboplatin, cediranib maleate, and paclitaxel as potential treatments for NSCLC.

This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of moxifloxacin and ertapenem intravenous drugs in treating hospitalized men and women with confirmed or suspected intra abdominal infection, who meet specific inclusion criteria and do not have any exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for gastric cancer, testing the drugs capecitabine and oxaliplatin in adult participants who have undergone potentially curative tumor resection and have not received prior chemotherapy or radiotherapy.

This sample is a phase 3 trial testing the drugs apixaban and enoxaparin for the treatment of venous thrombosis and pulmonary embolism in patients with congestive heart failure, acute respiratory failure, infection, acute rheumatic disorder, and inflammatory bowel disease. The eligibility criteria include age 40 or older, exclusion of patients with venous thromboembolism, active bleeding or high risk of bleeding, inability to take oral medication, and ongoing treatment with anticoagulants or antiplatelets other than aspirin at a dose ≤ 165 mg/day.
This sample is a phase 3 trial for the treatment of hyperlipidemia using a placebo drug, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for eligible participants.

This phase 3 clinical trial is investigating the use of memantine, a drug used to treat Alzheimer's disease, in patients with brain metastases from various solid tumor malignancies, who have stable systemic disease and meet specific eligibility criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the drug bosentan for the treatment of pulmonary hypertension and sickle cell anemia, with specific eligibility criteria including completion of a previous study, negative pregnancy test, and use of reliable contraception methods.
This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with pulmonary embolism, testing the drugs rivaroxaban and enoxaparin in combination with VKA, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial aims to evaluate the efficacy of ferinject ® (ferric carboxymaltose) and normal saline (0.9%) in treating stable symptomatic chronic heart failure (CHF) patients with low left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF) and iron deficiency, based on specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with type 2 diabetes, testing the drugs vildagliptin am, vildagliptin pm, and placebo, with inclusion criteria including being on metformin for at least three months and having a stable dose, and exclusion criteria including pregnancy, lactation, and significant diabetic complications.
This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for adolescents with schizophrenia, testing the effectiveness of risperidone as a treatment option, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria outlined.
This sample is a phase 3 trial for the treatment of psoriasis, testing the drugs placebo and ustekinumab, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with acute or primary HIV-1 infection, testing the effectiveness of multiple drug combinations including raltegravir, maraviroc, darunavir, ritonavir, and tenofovir/emtricitabine, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

In this phase 3 trial, the drugs being tested are edoxaban and enoxaparin sodium for the prevention of venous thromboembolism in patients undergoing unilateral total hip arthroplasty, with exclusion criteria including subjects with risks of hemorrhage, thromboembolic risks, weighing less than 40 kg, and those who are pregnant or suspect pregnancy.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial studying the effects of omega-3 fatty acids (fish oil supplements) versus placebo on patients who have experienced a heart attack in the 2 to 4 weeks before study entry, with exclusion criteria including metallic implants, active cancer, and significant kidney dysfunction.

This phase 3 clinical trial aims to evaluate the effectiveness of various drugs, including indacaterol and salmeterol/fluticasone, in treating moderate-to-severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) in patients aged ≥40 years with a smoking history of at least 20 pack years and specific lung function criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) using the drugs "nwp09" and "placebo" to assess the safety and efficacy of pharmacologic treatment in children aged 6 to 12 years.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for HIV infections, testing the effectiveness of various drug combinations including tenofovir/emtricitabine and nevirapine, and tenofovir/emtricitabine/efavirenz, among others, on HIV-1 infected patients with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.
This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with chronic myelogenous leukemia, testing the effectiveness of nilotinib and imatinib drugs, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.
This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for lung cancer, non-small cell, testing the drug hycamtin, oral capsules, with specific eligibility criteria for patients to participate in the trial.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with type 2 diabetes, testing the effectiveness of insulin glargine, insulin glulisine, metformin, and insulin secretagogue drugs in combination with basal insulin and other oral antidiabetic medications. The eligibility criteria include being a type 2 diabetic with a BMI ≤ 40 kg/m² and HbA1c > 7%, and exclusion criteria include type 1 diabetes, certain treatments, and various medical conditions.
This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for postmenopausal women with osteoporosis, testing the effectiveness of denosumab compared to a placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 2/phase 3 trial for patients with metastatic breast cancer, testing the effectiveness of drugs such as g-csf, trastuzumab, and vinorelbine, with specific eligibility criteria including confirmation of breast carcinoma, HER-2/neu overexpression, and adequate cardiac function.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for the drug brivaracetam tablets, bolus, and infusion, which aims to evaluate the efficacy and safety of the drug in treating epilepsy patients who are uncontrolled while being treated with 1 to 2 permitted concomitant antiepileptic drugs (AEDs). The study includes specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for eligible subjects.
This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients diagnosed with gastroesophageal reflux, testing the drugs lafutidine and famotidine, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for bipolar depression, testing the effectiveness of quetiapine fumarate (seroquel) extended release compared to a placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for patient eligibility.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with acute coronary syndromes, testing the switch from fondaparinux to bivalirudin or unfractionated heparin as a treatment option, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of psoriasis vulgaris using various drugs such as calcipotriol plus betamethasone and betamethasone-17,21-dipropionate, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial testing the effectiveness of ospemifene 60 mg, a drug used to treat vaginal atrophy, compared to a placebo, in menopausal women with moderate or severe symptoms of vaginal atrophy.
This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis, testing the drug bosentan, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of gemcitabine, capecitabine, and vinorelbine in treating breast cancer patients who have progressed after combination treatment of a taxane and an anthracycline, and meet specific eligibility criteria.
This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for epilepsy patients, testing the effectiveness of brivaracetam in reducing the frequency of partial onset seizures.
This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of metformin and cj-30001/cj-30002 in treating Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria outlined.

This phase 3 trial aims to evaluate the effectiveness of tadalafil, placebo, and finasteride in treating benign prostatic hyperplasia and enlarged prostate, with specific eligibility criteria for participants, such as not having taken certain treatments within a specified duration and having bladder outlet obstruction.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for kidney transplantation, focusing on the use of drugs like prograf-xl, prograf, and mmf, with specific eligibility criteria for patients, including exclusion criteria such as previous organ transplants, HIV seropositivity, and significant liver disease.
This sample is a phase 3 trial for obesity, testing the drugs vi-0521 and placebo matched phentermine/topiramate, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for metastatic breast cancer patients who have progressed on prior aromatase inhibitor therapy, and it aims to evaluate the efficacy of exemestane and everolimus in combination as a treatment option.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for pediatric patients with rhinitis, testing the effectiveness of levocetirizine in treating symptoms such as rhinorrhea, nasal congestion, and sneezing, with specific eligibility criteria including age range, QTc interval, and liver function.

Exclusion criteria include recent use of P2Y12 inhibitors, eptifibatide, tirofiban, or abciximab, receipt of fibrinolytic therapy, increased bleeding risk, and currently receiving warfarin or experiencing active bleeding.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with aneurysmal subarachnoid hemorrhage, testing the efficacy of the drug clazosentan compared to a placebo in preventing cerebral vasospasm.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with schizophrenia, testing the effectiveness of risperidone and ziprasidone as treatments. This phase 3 clinical trial is investigating the efficacy of ranibizumab injections and sham injections in treating macular edema and retinal vein occlusion, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria outlined.
This sample is a phase 3 trial for the treatment of spasticity in multiple sclerosis patients using Sativex, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria outlined.

This phase 3 clinical trial is testing the effectiveness of 5-fluorouracil, capecitabine, and cisplatin in treating advanced and/or metastatic gastric cancer in adults aged 18 to 75 years with at least 1 measurable lesion.

This phase 3 trial is investigating the efficacy of the drug tc-5214 compared to a placebo in patients with major depressive disorder (MDD) who have had an inadequate response to one antidepressant. The study aims to assess the safety and effectiveness of tc-5214 as an adjunctive treatment for MDD.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for breast neoplasms and hormone-dependent neoplasms, testing the drugs atamestane, toremifene, and letrozole, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for eligibility.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for major depressive disorder, testing the effectiveness of antidepressant + placebo and antidepressant + aripiprazole in patients who have had an inadequate response to one to three antidepressants.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), testing the effectiveness of drugs such as indacaterol and glycopyrronium (qva149) and fluticasone/salmeterol, compared to placebos, based on specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for Alzheimer's disease, testing the drugs dimebon and placebo on patients with mild-to-moderate Alzheimer's disease, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), testing the effectiveness of different drug treatments including placebo, tiotropium + olodaterol, tiotropium, and olodaterol, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for eligibility.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of migraine disorders using the drug np101 - sumatriptan iontophoretic transdermal patch, with a placebo control group, and includes eligibility criteria such as age range, diagnosis of migraine headache, and good health status.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for individuals with potential HIV exposure, testing the effectiveness of darunavir/ritonavir, lopinavir in fixed combination with ritonavir, zidovudine, nrtis, and efavirenz as HIV postexposure prophylaxis.

This phase 3 trial is testing the efficacy of desoximetasone spray 0.25% compared to placebo in treating stable plaque psoriasis involving at least 10% of the body surface area, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria outlined.

This phase 3 trial is investigating the effectiveness of mirabegron and solifenacin succinate in treating overactive urinary bladder in patients who have previously received antimuscarinic agents, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with restless legs syndrome, testing the drug xp13512 (gsk1838262) as a potential treatment. The inclusion criteria include having primary RLS symptoms, a minimum frequency of symptoms, and specific severity scores. Exclusion criteria include certain sleep disorders, neurologic diseases, abnormal laboratory results, and pregnancy.
This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of bipolar disorder using the drug aripiprazole, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for eligible participants.
This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of osteoporosis using the drug lasofoxifene, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for cytomegalovirus infections in adult lung transplant recipients, testing the effectiveness of valganciclovir as a treatment option, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for each phase.

This phase 3 clinical trial aims to evaluate the effectiveness of teriparatide and placebo in Japanese patients aged 55 or older with osteoporosis who are at high risk for fracture. The study will exclude patients with a history of metabolic bone disorders other than primary osteoporosis, history of malignant neoplasm in the past 5 years (except for treated skin cancers), and severe or chronically disabling conditions other than osteoporosis.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with stage I or II thoracic esophageal cancer, testing the effectiveness of cisplatin and fluorouracil as treatment options, with specific eligibility criteria related to the disease characteristics, patient characteristics, and prior concurrent therapy.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for the treatment of respiratory distress syndrome of prematurity and bronchopulmonary dysplasia using the drugs infasurf and sham, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.
The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with type 2 diabetes, testing the drugs saxagliptin and sitagliptin in combination with metformin, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for asthma patients, testing the effectiveness of fluticasone propionate/formoterol fumarate and other drugs in reducing symptoms and improving lung function, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria.
This sample is a phase 3 trial testing the drug rimonabant and placebo for patients with cardiovascular disease, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with chronic hepatitis C. The study aims to evaluate the effectiveness of telaprevir, pegylated interferon alfa-2a, and ribavirin in patients who failed previous therapy. The inclusion criteria include being a control group patient from a previous study, completing all assessments, and using effective birth control. Exclusion criteria include receiving other HCV therapy, having decompensated liver disease or pancreatitis, requiring systemic corticosteroids, and having a history of non-compliance or unsafe treatment.

This phase 3 clinical trial aims to evaluate the effectiveness of mifepristone and its different dosages in treating major depressive disorder with psychotic features, using patients aged 18 to 75 years who are able to provide informed consent, while excluding those with major medical problems, previous participation in a mifepristone clinical trial, or a history of allergic reactions to mifepristone.
This sample is a phase 3 trial for venous thrombosis, testing the drugs rivaroxaban and enoxaparin followed by vka, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for the treatment of schizophrenia using the drugs blonanserin and risperidone. The study includes eligibility criteria such as meeting DSM-IV-TR criteria for schizophrenia, age between 18 and 65, PANSS total score ≥70 and ≤120, and willingness to comply with the study protocol. Exclusion criteria include recent treatment with other investigational products or long-acting drugs for schizophrenia, as well as a history of treatment with clozapine.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with partial seizures and epilepsies, testing the effectiveness of pregabalin and placebo as an add-on treatment for patients currently taking 1 to 3 anti-epilepsy medicines at stable dosages.
This sample is a phase 3 trial for attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) using the drug atomoxetine, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for patients aged 8 to 10 years old.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for breast cancer patients, testing the drugs capecitabine (Xeloda) and taxotere. The eligibility criteria include female patients aged 18-70 with adenocarcinoma of the breast and no evidence of metastatic disease.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for chronic hepatitis B, testing the effectiveness of pegylated interferon alpha 2b in patients with specific eligibility criteria, including baseline HBV DNA levels and liver stiffness measurements.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for multiple sclerosis patients who have completed the BENEFIT study, testing the effectiveness of interferon beta-1b (betaseron, bay86-5046) in preventing the development of clinically definite multiple sclerosis (CDMS).

This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the effectiveness of sitagliptin phosphate and placebo as add-on therapy to glimepiride, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for leukemia and lymphoma patients, testing the effectiveness of a combination of drugs including asparaginase, cyclophosphamide, and vincristine sulfate, among others, with specific eligibility criteria based on disease characteristics and patient characteristics.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of diabetic retinopathy and diabetic macular edema, using drugs such as triamcinolone acetonide, ranibizumab, and sham injection, with specific eligibility criteria for study eye inclusion.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with metastatic prostate cancer, testing the effectiveness of risedronate and placebo drugs in combination with androgen deprivation therapy, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of prostatic hyperplasia using dutasteride and placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for eligible patients.

This sample is a phase 2/phase 3 trial for asthma patients, testing the drugs vr506 and placebo, with inclusion criteria including age, documented clinical history of asthma, and ability to use the new inhaler correctly, and exclusion criteria including regular use of topical steroids, recent respiratory tract infection, and history of lung cancer.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for Crohn's disease, testing the drugs gsk1605786a and placebo, with eligibility criteria including achieving clinical response in a previous study and stable doses of Crohn's disease medications.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for kidney diseases, testing the effectiveness of enteric-coated mycophenolate sodium, tacrolimus, and corticosteroids in kidney transplant patients with specific eligibility criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for ovarian cancer patients, testing the effectiveness of carboplatin, cyclophosphamide, mitoxantrone hydrochloride, and paclitaxel drugs in combination with chemotherapy, with specific eligibility criteria for patients including disease stage, response to chemotherapy, age, performance status, hematopoietic and hepatic function, and prior therapy history.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for the treatment of dry eye, using dexamethasone phosphate ophthalmic solution and sodium citrate buffer solution, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.
This sample is a phase 3 trial for previously untreated metastatic colon or rectal cancer, testing the effectiveness of bevacizumab and fluoropyrimidine-based chemotherapy as a first-line treatment.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for individuals with Down syndrome and Alzheimer's disease, testing the effectiveness of vitamin E, multivitamin, and placebo in improving cognitive function, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participation.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for chemotherapy-induced nausea and vomiting (CINV), testing the effectiveness of comparator drugs (fosaprepitant dimeglumine, aprepitant, dexamethasone, ondansetron) in combination with cisplatin chemotherapy, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for patient eligibility.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), testing the effectiveness of aclidinium bromide compared to a placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria outlined.
This sample is a phase 3 trial for infants who are small for gestational age, testing the effectiveness of genotropin and control (no treatment) in promoting growth.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of complicated urinary tract infection (cUTI) and pyelonephritis. This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with type 2 diabetes, testing the effectiveness of insulin degludec and sitagliptin in combination with other oral antidiabetic drugs, with specific eligibility criteria including duration of diabetes, ongoing treatment, BMI, and HbA1c levels.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with schizophrenia and psychotic disorders, testing the effectiveness of risperidone as a continuous treatment option, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial is investigating the effectiveness of torcetrapib/atorvastatin and atorvastatin in treating hypercholesterolemia and hyperlipidemia, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for eligible participants.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for Parkinson's disease and dyskinesias, testing the drug ropinirole controlled-release (Requip CR) for restless leg syndrome, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria related to levodopa therapy and cognitive function.

This phase 3 clinical trial aims to evaluate the effectiveness of lidocaine patches in treating persistent neuropathic pain following surgical procedures for cancer diagnosis or treatment, with specific eligibility criteria including pain rating, size of painful area, and absence of certain conditions or medications.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with multiple myeloma, testing the effectiveness of granulocyte colony-stimulating factor plus plerixafor and granulocyte colony-stimulating factor plus placebo in combination with other chemotherapy drugs, with specific eligibility criteria for inclusion and exclusion.

Prior or concurrent chemotherapy and concurrent steroids are allowed, but certain medications for attention deficit disorder, anxiety disorder, schizophrenia, or substance abuse are not permitted.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with rectal cancer, specifically T3 or T4 disease, testing the drug tegafur and uracil. The eligibility criteria include specific disease characteristics, performance status, hematopoietic and renal function, and prior treatment history.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for the treatment of gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD) using dexlansoprazole and placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for systemic lupus erythematosus, testing the efficacy of belimumab at different doses compared to a placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for metastatic breast cancer patients, testing the efficacy of pertuzumab, trastuzumab, and docetaxel in combination with placebo, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for breast cancer patients, testing the drugs zd9393 (zoladex) 10.8 mg and zd9393 (zoladex) 3.6 mg, with eligibility criteria including pre-menopausal females with hormone sensitivity and confirmation of breast cancer.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with fallopian tube cancer or ovarian cancer, testing the drugs TCG and TC, with eligibility criteria including histologically confirmed diagnosis, recent surgery, specific age and performance status requirements, and various medical condition exclusions.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for non-small cell lung cancer, testing the effectiveness of carboplatin and paclitaxel as a treatment option, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of schizophrenia with quetiapine xr, targeting patients aged 18 to 60 with a diagnosis of schizophrenia and associated cannabis abuse and/or psychotic disorders through cannabis.

This phase 3 clinical trial aims to evaluate the efficacy of albumin-bound paclitaxel, paclitaxel, and carboplatin in treating stage IIIB or IV non-small cell lung carcinoma (NSCLC) patients who have not received prior chemotherapy for metastatic disease. Exclusion criteria include recent medication use, history of drug dependence or abuse, previous participation in clinical trials, certain sexual disorders, menopause or hysterectomy, and pregnancy or breastfeeding.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for kidney transplantation, testing drugs such as fk506mr, prograf, mycophenolate mofetil, methylprednisolone, and prednisolone, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for patient eligibility.

The study includes subjects with schizophrenia who must sign a written consent form, and excludes those with clinically significant heart, kidney, liver, or gastrointestinal diseases, as well as those with psychiatric disorders other than schizophrenia.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for major depressive disorder, testing the drugs tc-5214 and placebo, with inclusion criteria including inadequate response to one antidepressant and exclusion criteria including a history of bipolar disorder or suicide attempts.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for allergy, specifically grass pollen-related allergic rhinoconjunctivitis, testing the efficacy of a grass pollen allergen extract tablet and placebo tablet in children aged 5 to 17 years who have been sensitized to grass pollen and have experienced symptoms in previous pollen seasons.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of acute bacterial sinusitis, testing the efficacy of mfns and antibiotic nasal spray compared to a placebo nasal spray plus antibiotic, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), testing the effectiveness of various drugs including olodaterol, tiotropium, and placebos, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for eligibility.

This sample is a phase 2/phase 3 trial for patients with chronic idiopathic constipation, testing the drug plecanatide. The inclusion criteria include meeting the modified Rome III criteria for constipation, having less than 3 complete spontaneous bowel movements per week, and willingness to discontinue certain medications. The exclusion criteria include having loose or watery stool, having Irritable Bowel Syndrome, and having certain gastrointestinal conditions or surgeries.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), testing the efficacy of sodium alginate double action tablets and placebo in reducing heartburn symptoms. The inclusion criteria include a history of frequent episodes of GERD-related symptoms, while the exclusion criteria include various gastrointestinal diseases and recent significant weight loss.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with metastatic melanoma, testing the combination of elesclomol and paclitaxel as a treatment option. The eligibility criteria include confirmed melanoma diagnosis, specific performance status, measurable disease, and other protocol parameters.

In this phase 3 trial, the drug combination of sunitinib malate and taxotere is being tested for the treatment of breast neoplasms, specifically unresectable locally recurrent or metastatic disease in patients with Her-2 negative tumors. This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with colorectal neoplasms, testing the effectiveness of 5fu+l-leucovorin and uft+leucovorin as adjuvant chemotherapy after tumor resection, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with active ankylosing spondylitis, testing the effectiveness of meloxicam suppository, meloxicam tablet, and indomethacin as treatment options.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for the drug tak-438 in patients with erosive esophagitis, who have successfully completed a preceding study and have endoscopically healed EE, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for stage IV non-small cell lung cancer patients, testing the drugs gemcitabine and erlotinib, with eligibility criteria including histologically documented NSCLC, measurable disease, and normal hepatic function.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with hypertension, testing the effectiveness of telmisartan and hydrochlorothiazide combination drugs in reducing blood pressure, with specific eligibility criteria for patient selection.
This sample is a phase 3 trial for the treatment of pulmonary hypertension using oral treprostinil sustained release tablets, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for eligible participants.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with type 1 diabetes mellitus, testing the efficacy of the drugs viaject™ and regular human insulin, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 2/phase 3 clinical trial for rheumatoid arthritis, testing the drugs sarilumab, placebo (for sarilumab), methotrexate, and folic acid, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for the treatment of prostatic neoplasms using drugs such as prednisone, sunitinib, and placebo, with specific eligibility criteria for inclusion and exclusion.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with advanced liver cancer who have progressed on or are intolerant to sorafenib treatment, and it will test the efficacy of everolimus compared to a placebo.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of depression in patients with bipolar I disorder, testing the efficacy of armodafinil compared to a placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for patient eligibility.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the efficacy of vildagliptin and placebo in combination with insulin and metformin, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 clinical trial aims to evaluate the effectiveness of divalproex sodium er, a drug used to treat bipolar disorder, compared to a placebo, in patients with bipolar I or II who are currently depressed. This sample is a phase 3 trial testing the effectiveness of losartan potassium, amlodipine besylate, and enalapril maleate in treating proteinuria associated with chronic kidney disease in children aged 1 to 17 years, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of pharyngitis, testing the effectiveness of the drugs placebo and flurbiprofen, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for patient eligibility.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with osteoarthritis, rheumatoid arthritis, and ankylosing spondylitis, testing the effectiveness of a combination drug (naproxen and omeprazole) in reducing the risk of gastric or duodenal ulcers associated with long-term NSAID therapy.

The eligibility criteria include specific lung function measurements and exclude patients with certain comorbid conditions or contraindications to the drugs.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for venous thromboembolism, testing the drugs rivaroxaban, enoxaparin, and placebos, with inclusion and exclusion criteria for patients undergoing elective total knee replacement.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with atrial fibrillation and lung cancer, testing the drug amiodarone, with inclusion criteria of resectable lung nodule or mass and exclusion criteria including allergy to amiodarone, current use of amiodarone, and various cardiac and pulmonary conditions.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with chronic low back pain, testing the effectiveness of OROS hydromorphone slow release as a treatment option, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the effectiveness of sitagliptin and metformin in combination with placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for liver transplantation patients, testing the effectiveness of Prograf-XL and Prograf (tacrolimus) in preventing host vs graft reaction, with eligibility criteria including being a primary liver transplant recipient and receiving the first dose of the drug within 48 hours of transplantation.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for relapsing multiple sclerosis, testing the drug fty720. The inclusion criteria include being 18-65 years old and having relapsing MS, while the exclusion criteria include having a type of MS that is not relapsing, a history of chronic immune disease, certain cancers, certain eye disorders in diabetic patients, being on certain immunosuppressive medications or heart medications, having certain heart conditions, and certain lung conditions.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of hypercholesterolemia using lapaquistat acetate and current lipid-lowering treatment, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck, who have completed definitive treatment within the past 3 months. The study aims to evaluate the efficacy of tegafur-gimeracil-oteracil potassium and tegafur-uracil in these patients. Eligibility criteria include specific disease characteristics and patient characteristics such as performance status, blood counts, liver and kidney function, and absence of certain medical conditions. Concurrent therapy with biologic therapy, radiotherapy, other chemotherapy, or any other therapy is not allowed.

This phase 3 trial is testing the drug carboxyamidotriazole in patients with stage III or IV non-small cell lung cancer who have previously received chemotherapy, and have specific eligibility criteria including blood counts, liver function, and expected survival of at least three months.
This sample is a phase 3 trial for the treatment of schizophrenia, using the drugs asenapine and olanzapine, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for diabetic macular edema, testing the effectiveness of fluocinolone acetonide in patients with diabetes mellitus types 1 or 2, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with malignant mesothelioma, testing the drugs doxorubicin hydrochloride and ranpirnase, with eligibility criteria including confirmed histology, specific disease characteristics, age, performance status, and various medical conditions.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with cystic fibrosis, testing the efficacy of mp-376 (levofloxacin solution for inhalation) compared to a placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for patient eligibility.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with schizophrenia or schizoaffective disorder, testing the drug ziprasidone. The inclusion criteria include patients not currently being treated with antipsychotic medication and a diagnosis of schizophrenia or schizoaffective disorder. The exclusion criteria include patients at immediate risk of harm to self or others and current antipsychotic treatment.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for neuropathic pain, testing the drug pregabalin, with inclusion criteria including Chinese outpatients aged 18 to 75 and a score of greater than 40 mm on the visual log scale of SF-MPQ, and exclusion criteria including neurologic disorders unrelated to neuropathic pain and serum creatinine clearance greater than 60 ml/min.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for asthma in Chinese pediatric and adolescent subjects, testing the efficacy of fluticasone propionate inhalation solution, oral prednisone, placebo inhalation solution, placebo tablet, and salbutamol as treatments, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria outlined in the protocol.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) who have received one prior platinum-based chemotherapy regimen. The trial aims to evaluate the efficacy of erlotinib (Tarceva) in treating NSCLC patients with specific characteristics, such as inoperable, locally advanced or metastatic disease.

This phase 3 trial is investigating the effectiveness of insulin degludec/liraglutide versus placebo in subjects with type 2 diabetes mellitus who are on a stable dose of sulphonylurea with or without metformin, and have a HbA1c level between 7.0-9.0%.

This phase 3 trial is investigating the effectiveness of fluorouracil, gemcitabine hydrochloride, and leucovorin calcium in treating pancreatic cancer patients who have undergone complete resection and meet specific eligibility criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of chronic constipation using the drug prucalopride, with inclusion criteria including a history of chronic constipation and exclusion criteria including other organic diseases and severe cardiovascular, liver, or lung disease.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with essential hypertension, testing the effectiveness of nifedipine (adalat, baya1040) in reducing blood pressure despite previous antihypertensive treatment.

This sample is a phase 2/phase 3 trial that focuses on cardiovascular disease, aging, and endothelial dysfunction in sedentary elderly individuals. The drug being tested is alt-711, and the eligibility criteria include being healthy, sedentary, and aged 65 years or older.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients diagnosed with Chronic Phase Philadelphia chromosome positive (CP Ph+) CML who have failed to achieve CCyR after 3-18 months of therapy with imatinib 400 mg. The study aims to evaluate the efficacy and safety of dasatinib and imatinib as treatment options for these patients.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with heart disease, stroke, ischemic heart disease, and myocardial infraction, testing the effectiveness of aspirin and warfarin in reducing the risk of embolism, with specific eligibility and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial aims to investigate the effectiveness of aspirin in patients with thrombocytopenia and myocardial infraction, with specific eligibility criteria including platelet count, cardiac enzyme levels, and ability to give consent.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) and it is testing the effectiveness of aclidinium bromide/formoterol fumarate and placebo in improving lung function. The trial has specific inclusion and exclusion criteria, and patients must meet certain eligibility requirements to participate.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with metastatic colorectal cancer, testing the effectiveness of regorafenib (stivarga, bay73-4506) compared to a placebo, with specific eligibility criteria for inclusion and exclusion.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with type 2 diabetes, testing the effectiveness of technosphere® insulin and technosphere powder as a treatment option, with specific eligibility criteria for enrollment.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the effectiveness of rosiglitazone, sulfonylurea, and metformin in lowering glycated hemoglobin levels, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.
This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for schizophrenia, testing the effectiveness of paliperidone er and placebo as drugs, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.
This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of psoriatic arthritis using the drugs onercept and placebo, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), testing the effectiveness of fluticasone furoate and fluticasone propionate/salmeterol in improving lung function and symptoms. The inclusion criteria include being ≥ 40 years old, having a clinical history of COPD, and being a former or current smoker. The exclusion criteria include having asthma, other respiratory disorders, or poorly controlled COPD, as well as various other medical conditions.

This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of fluorouracil and irofulven in treating locally advanced or metastatic pancreatic cancer patients who have failed one prior gemcitabine-containing chemotherapy regimen.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with infiltrating primary breast cancer, testing the effectiveness of various drugs including aromatase inhibition therapy, cyclophosphamide, docetaxel, and others, with eligibility criteria including specific disease characteristics, patient characteristics, and prior concurrent therapy restrictions.

This phase 3 trial aims to evaluate the efficacy of half-boosted and full-boosted fosamprenavir, antiretroviral drugs, in subjects with HIV-1 infection, while considering various inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with bipolar I disorder experiencing a major depressive episode, testing the efficacy of armodafinil and placebo as adjunctive treatment to mood stabilizers.
This sample is a phase 3 trial for hypertension, testing the drug candesartan cilexetil (atacand) in children with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of perennial allergic rhinitis, testing the effectiveness of various drugs including ciclesonide hfa nasal aerosol and ciclesonide aqueous nasal spray, with specific eligibility criteria for subjects to be included in the study.

This phase 3 clinical trial aims to evaluate the efficacy of febuxostat and allopurinol in treating gout patients with a serum urate level of 8.0 mg/dL or higher, while excluding subjects with certain medical conditions or taking specific medications.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with type 2 diabetes, testing the effectiveness of technosphere® insulin inhalation powder and 70% insulin aspart protamine suspension and 30% insulin aspart injection in improving glycemic control, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for eligibility.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the efficacy of lixisenatide, a drug used to control blood sugar levels, in combination with other medications. The eligibility criteria include having a diagnosis of type 2 diabetes for at least 1 year and insufficient control with a sulfonylurea alone or in combination with metformin.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for asthma patients, testing the effectiveness of the drugs flutiform and symbicort turbohaler in combination with inhaled corticosteroids, and the eligibility criteria include age, asthma history, lung function, and willingness to use study medication.
This sample is a phase 3 trial for hypertension, testing the effectiveness of amlodipine in treating untreated and treated hypertensive patients, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

The sample is a phase 3 trial for Parkinson's disease, testing the drug parcopa, with inclusion criteria of stable Parkinson's disease and exclusion criteria of idiopathic PD with Hoehn and Yahr state II or III.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for postmenopausal women with vulvar and vaginal atrophy, testing the effectiveness of ospemifene 60mg oral tablet in improving symptoms and meeting specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the effectiveness of insulin human/insuman comb 25 and insulin human/novolin® 30r in combination with oral anti-diabetic drugs, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 3 trial aims to evaluate the effectiveness of ezetimibe and simvastatin in treating hypercholesterolemia and diabetes mellitus type 2 in patients with coronary heart disease, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria outlined.
This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for osteoarthritis knee pain, testing the effectiveness of duloxetine and placebo drugs, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for ovarian and peritoneal neoplasms, testing the efficacy of drugs such as placebo, paclitaxel, bibf 1120, and carboplatin, with specific eligibility criteria for patients to participate in the trial.

This phase 3 clinical trial aims to evaluate the effectiveness of amlodipine/losartan and amlodipine in treating hypertension in patients aged 18 and over, with specific blood pressure measurements as inclusion criteria and various exclusion criteria related to medical conditions, medications, and pregnancy.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with renal failure, testing the drugs prograf (tacrolimus) and lcp-tacro, with inclusion criteria including age between 18 and 70, negative pregnancy test, and ability to swallow tablets and capsules, and exclusion criteria including history of alcohol or recreational drug abuse, significant cardiac or pulmonary disorders, and positive serological tests for HIV, HBV, or HCV.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial testing the effectiveness of vortioxetine, escitalopram, and placebo in treating treatment-emergent sexual dysfunction (TESD) in patients currently being treated with selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor (SSRI) monotherapy for major depressive episode (MDE).
This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with advanced colorectal cancer, testing the efficacy of capecitabine, perifosine, and placebo drugs, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.
